amendment.description: To increase appropriations for firefighter assistance grants, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4626 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4626 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S7475-7478) To increase appropriations for firefighter assistance grants, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4626 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4626 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
